name: Dark Comfort for Wikipedia

user.name: R3gi CZ
user.about:
I'm hobby amateur designer from Czech Republic. Here I would like to share UI styles for services I use a lot. I think it's better to share them than just keep them for my personal use. That's all. I hope you'll find them useful.

If you like my work, you can write me some feedback or you can by me a beer ;-)

additional_info:
Dark UI theme for Wikipedia.org
Author: R3gi, Czech Republic

Designed to be pleasing for eyes during the whole day!

More screenshots here: http://imgur.com/a/n4Oo0 (file size upload limit is set to ridiculous 200 KB)

Feel free to report issues and unthemed elements, but please note I don't plan to redesign any parts of custom styles for certain languages (except Czech and English).

Don't forget to try also my other stylesheets from the Dark Comfort family.

If you find it useful, don't be afraid to leave a comment or you can by me a beer ;-)

Enjoy!

discussions.name: Good style, very nice on the eyes
Good style, very nice on the eyes
